<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Cinderclaw Gauntlet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=482)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #145: Hellknight Hill](/Sources.aspx?ID=4) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn on 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Spiked Gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=11)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Reaction" /><row>command</row></row>

 

**Trigger** Your attack roll with the _Cinderclaw gauntlet_ is a critical success.

 
</row>

</column>

---

This sharp-taloned _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [spiked gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=11) _appears to have been crafted from dragon scales, with claws built from iron. In addition to the typical weapon traits, a _Cinderclaw gauntlet_ has the [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200) trait.

 On a critical hit, the _Cinderclaw gauntlet_ deals an additional 1d6 fire damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
